title: [Admission] BTech 2nd round won't happen (?)
content: Earlier when we'd go to important dates section, it showed a possible 2nd round in July 2025 but now it is removed. Looks like it won't happen. This is so bad, didn't even get the chance to appear and lost 1000 rs too. Also in some other post on the sub, someone did comment that very less seats were surrendered so 2nd round has been cancelled, which kinda validates. Tough luck, i have :)

comments.body: I checked that too management hi shit hai college ke saath saath
actually we can actually sue them if they do that , we can say that we missed admission to other college because of this , also we paid money for second round
To mat aa kon bulara h ü§°
If the round is cancelled they will refund your money
15 july last date h surrender krne ke liye, probably uske baad jitni seats bachegi uske hisab se karwayenge 2nd round.
15 july last date h surrender krne ke liye, probably uske baad jitni seats bachegi uske hisab se karwayenge 2nd round.
it's for kcet students, my parent's friend who spoke with management told so
it is cancelled but i doubt they will because they can say it is for round 1
it's not because very less seats surrendered, they had included both cet and jee as ways of entering now they are using cet rank card instead
What ,the fee??
yes
Nh the y wont
Then why did they open applications for JEE again after round 1?
because they previously decided to hold a round 2 but now instead decided to use only cet rank cards, idk why
confirmed not happening ?
I read somewhere ki 1 round of jee counseling ki seat jo surrender ho gyi hai wo kcet counseling me consider krenge
No way
normally it gets postponed like a million times (happened with my batch too) but a 2nd round will definitely happened and probably after kcet 1st round
the admissions office of every university is full of shit, its the inevitable nature of india üôè
all the best suing

Nahi aisa nahi krenge woh kabhi v, kcet ki seats 40% h sayad aur fee kam lgta h kcet se admission lene pe, woh log khud kyu apna loss karayenge. Aur aisa hota toh round 1 of jee mains ke baad kyu open krte round 2 ke liye registration through jee mains.

Round 2 mein PES has already declared merit list based on KCET score. So the second round admission will happen on PESU KCET ranking and not based PESU JEE ranking.
.The seats for PESU KCET ranking will come from the seats surrendered by round 1 candidates ( PESU JEE RANKERS). This category has 45% seats.

Another 40% seats are allocated for KCET KEA ranking.The admission for these seats are done by Govt.i.e KEA
yes you're right

Kcet & jee seat quotas are 2 separate quotas of seats. Whatever will be surrendered from round 1 will only be available to jee mains round 2.from this year Passat & jee seats are pooled at 45% of total seats & kcet seats are 40 pc
No ‚Ä¶

Passat 40 + jee 5 is now 45% through jee only .
KCET 40 remains same ( govt ke through over & above second round kuch nahi hai .)

Its not right.. There are 3 quotas to be precise.

1st -  45% seats- ( PESU generated ranking based on JEE score ranking for 1st round. For second round PESU generated ranking based on KCET score)

2nd - 40% seats - Through KCET KEA (Govt) ranking,No change same as last year.

3 - 15 % seats through Management quota.
For the second round for 45% seats..PESU KCET ranking is already released and counselling is scheduled for 20th July.In this round you have seats which are surrendered by by round 1 candidates.

Totally incorrect ‚Ä¶ this second round is based on KCET ranking re-ranked (rearranged starting from 001) by PES & it will allot 40% seats (altogether separate from jee seats alloted in round 1)
Seats surrendered from round 1 jee will only be given to jee candidates ( in a round may be named as jee second round )

It is happening on 20th July I got the message

https://preview.redd.it/l1w1e6ur12cf1.png?width=1080&format=png&auto=webp&s=a273b387d7a77fcef638d09567886174c1888e7d

Upvote üôèüèª
Chacha ji ‚Ä¶ jee second round aa gaya üòÄ
Wow

Enjoy Buddy ...cannt explain you more .. :-)   
  
BTW  govt KCET KEA - Seat Matrix is declared and they declared the 40% seat quota which will be filled by KEA Counselling and NOT by PESU Ref page 1 College code E009 PES (RR Campus) E141 PES EC  
[https://cetonline.karnataka.gov.in/keawebentry456/ugcet2025/BULL\_ENGG\_FREE\_2025english.pdf](https://cetonline.karnataka.gov.in/keawebentry456/ugcet2025/BULL_ENGG_FREE_2025english.pdf)
